name: Bladeline VR
description: Bladeline VR is a game designed to make players enjoy powerful sword actions. Get the best score, prove your performance and be the best swordsman ever!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 - 5 Gen Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980ti DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 - 6 Gen Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
